recipes.label: Hint: A Sustaining Performance: Not Enough!
recipes.startdescription: There is something here, but I cannot quite reach it. If I could stage a performance with a stronger tie to Heart.

recipes.previewdescription: This performance will not be complete before the audience joins in. together we can sustain the energy of this show until the stars flicker out again, and we can sustain whatever other things I may desire too
recipes.label: Perform a Show laced with the Intent of Heart
recipes.startdescription: Halfway through the performance, the first audience member joined in with the chorus. Now, we all sing with one voice, with no edge between one voice and the next.
Now comes the time for me to channel this energy into whatever target I desire.

slots.label: Direction
slots.description: Now that my Intent is set, I have to set my Direction. What do I wish to affect?
